overview:
Raised by a system analyst (my dad) who loves technology and a designer (my mom) who loves nature, I’ve been always passionate by tech and design with a strong business perspective.

With over 10 years of experience working with startups at university incubators, I’ve shifted from a experienced business plan consultant to a business model specialist, startup accelerators mentor and entrepreneur.

After gathering good experience at big companies such as IBM and Assespro, I work nowadays with what I love and believe that is able to change our world for the best.

I definitely believe that we are going through a very unique moment as technology empowers people all around the globe and provide ways of human evolution respecting and recovering nature. I love being a contributor of this history turnaround.
